name: Chibi Princess Maker - Cute Anime Creator Games
name_original: Chibi Princess Maker - Cute Anime Creator Games
description:
Chibi Princess Dolls is a game for girls and toddlers where the child can be a designer, dress-up a chibi dolls.

Thousands of different combinations of color full clothes accessories!

Feature
- 14 Chibi Princess Dolls
- 20 Dresses
- 14 Crown
- 20 Hairs
- 19 Gloves
- 19 Pants & Skirts
- 20 Shirts
- 15 Shoes
- 8 Background
- Over ton combinations!
- Happy hour family

Start Creating Your Cute Chibi Princess, Download Now!!!!
